node.detail_zh: 患者為懷孕 36 周孕婦，沒有病徵。8 月 21 日乘搭 QR818 由巴基斯坦經多哈回港，抵港後與丈夫及兒子入住酒店進行家居檢疫，9 月 3 日檢疫期滿返回住所。9 月 4 日早上到醫院接受預約產前檢查，為審慎起見醫護人員安排患者轉到隔離病房並接受病毒測試。患者於產前病房逗留了約 45 分鐘，曾經使用病人洗手間，其餘時間留在診症室，同房沒有其他病人。
node.detail_en: The patient is 36 weeks pregnant and exhibited no symptoms. On August 21 she arrived in Hong Kong from Pakistan via Doha by flight QR818, and stayed at a hotel along with her husband and son for compulsory home quarantine. She returned to her residence on September 3, and visited a hospital on September 4 to book an appointment for for antenatal checkup. The hospital staff transferred her to an isolation ward for a virus test, and she stayed at the antenatal ward for around 45 minutes, having used the patients' toilet, with no presence of other patients.
